snippet: Many players are sending mixed signals about the World Baseball Classic, an event that has featured several foreign players who have gone on to the major leagues.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column outlines upcoming World Baseball Classic, noting that American roster continues to lack many top-notch players due to fear of injury and lack of enthusiasm.
lead_paragraph: Many players are sending mixed signals about the World Baseball Classic, an event that has featured several foreign players who have gone on to the major leagues.

headline.seo: World Baseball Classic Is Still Finding Its Footing
headline.main: Global Event Succeeds Where It Needs To
headline.print_headline: Global Event Succeeds Where It Needs To
